roleset.name: able to provide an argument for

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Note that some of these topics could be converted into theses that-1 [*PRO*-1] would be arguable to a general audience if they were de-personalized and established as arguable issues.

example.name: args 0,1
example.text: It's not arguable by an attorney of integrity.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, relation to argue-v.01.
